name: Pop Dog Bubble Shooter
description:
We welcome you to our colourful bubbling challenge. This is a bubble shooting game where you can have fun on your own or with your friends!

If you like Match 3 type games, this is the one you gotta play. Just pop the colourful bubbles and relax. This is the awesome popping game you've wished for so long!

You won't be able to find a Match 3 type game more addictive than this one right here. Although you might have already played similar games before, this one is special, where you'll get to experience the true power and pleasure of destroying them all! Take control of the canon and shoot down all the colourful spheres in each level you face. Furthermore, overcome all the levels and obstacles to become a legend of the bubble shotting games. However, you gotta be patient, improve your accuracy and skills to hit all the targets with the balls.

Furthermore, our dogs are well trained by the army, making them terrific shooters. Thus, you shouldn't worry about yourself, as you will get your ass saved by having them on your side. What´s more, you’ll discover all type of bonuses that will help you beat the many challenges.

Join us and discover the gigantic map, where you can unlock more than 50 different levels, plus many puzzles on each stage.
Also, enjoy the high quality graphics, many sound effects and an exciting gameplay. Invite all your friends and find out who is the best!

You and your friends will definitely have a good time!
